entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
